Very good hotel nice athmosphere front of the beach

2: Worst € 30 breakfast I have ever experienced
The hotel feels like a hip nightclub all day and night
Very unwelcoming experience she missed out on a big sale too
The common areas and restaurants very hip
Lounge atmosphere but lots of fun at night

The staff seems to lack the sophistication of a 5 star hotel experience their outfits seemed worn out to me and while they were trying to meet up expectations they lacked the experience to come up with the required demands
So here we are ringing up reception again and they sent some guys up and from the vibes it seems that the AC can not be fixed and told us front desk would call us to see what can be done
Massive queue Non personal experience with all staff
All that being said the atmosphere outweighs the downside
I was disappointed to see a number of aspects had deteriorated ie service in the bar lounge area and the general upkeep of the hotel
